whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.description1: OpenSource3DAssets.com is a registry that helps you discover quality 3D assets with clear licensing.
whatWeDo.description2: We showcase open source 3D models from talented creators - props, environments, structures, and more. All assets use the GLB format, making them compatible with major game engines and 3D software. No more hunting through scattered repositories. We collect the metadata and links so you can focus on creating.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: We index collections → Preserve metadata → You browse & download
steps: We find 3D asset collections with open source licenses
We catalog download links, previews, specs, and license info
You filter by collection, theme, or style and download what you need
Files are hosted on GitHub, IPFS, or Arweave—making them accessible and preservable
howItWorks.description: Think of us as a search engine for free 3D assets - making 991+ models discoverable in one place.

polygonalMind.title: Polygonal Mind Collections
polygonalMind.description: 17 themed collections featuring props, environments, and structures. From MomusPark's park assets to Tomb Chaser's Egyptian pyramids and Japanese neon pagodas.

license.title: Licensing
license.description: Most assets in our collection are CC0 (public domain) - meaning you can use them for anything without attribution. Some collections may have different licenses, which we clearly display on each asset page.

format.title: File Format
format.description: All assets use GLB (binary glTF), the standard format for 3D on the web and beyond. Compatible with Blender, Unity, Unreal Engine, Three.js, and more.

storage.title: Data Storage
storage.description: Asset metadata and files can be stored on GitHub, IPFS, or Arweave—ensuring long-term accessibility, decentralization, and version control. We're not limited to a single hosting provider.

future.title: What's Next
items: More asset collections from talented creators
Advanced filtering by polygon count, material type, and theme

submitCollection.title: Submit a Collection
submitCollection.description: Have open-licensed 3D assets you'd like to share? We'd love to add them!

contributeCode.title: Contribute Code
contributeCode.description: Found a bug? Want to add a feature?

giveFeedback.title: Give Feedback
giveFeedback.description: Have ideas for improvement? Let us know!
